properties.areaDesc: Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas; Mississippi Sound; Lake Borgne
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 11:34PM CST until February 7 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 30 kt with occasional gusts up to
40 kt and waves 4 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas, Mississippi
Sound and Lake Borgne.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 2 AM CST Friday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, until 6 AM CST Friday.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY
